questions.question: What should you do if you encounter a forest fire while hiking?

options.A: Immediately start running in the opposite direction.
options.B: Find a nearby body of water and submerge yourself.
options.C: Stay low to the ground and move to a cleared area, away from trees and dry grass.
options.D: Attempt to put out the fire with any available materials.

questions.question: How should you escape a building that is on fire?

options.A: Use the elevator to get downstairs quickly.
options.C: Stay in your room and wait for help.
options.D: Crawl low under smoke and exit the building via the nearest safe exit.

questions.question: What safety measures should you take to prevent wildfires in your area?

options.B: Dispose of cigarette butts and matches in a safe container.
options.C: Store firewood next to your house for easy access.
options.D: Create a defensible space by clearing away dry vegetation from your home.
